text: Macbeth is a 1909 Italian silent drama movie directed by Mario CaseriniPeter Cochran. Small-Screen Shakespeare and stars Dante Cappelli, Maria Caserini, and Amleto Palormi. The movie is an adaptation of the William Shakespeare play Macbeth. ==Actors== *Dante Cappelli as Macbeth *Maria Caserini as Lady Macbeth *Amleto Palormi *Ettore Pesci ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Italian silent movies
title: Macbeth (1909 Italian movie)
